name: Spirit Lamp
description: The Spirit Lamp is a medium undead creature that manipulates light and spirits, characterized by its ghostly appearance and glowing lantern.
memorable: It can trap spirits and curse creatures, making it a formidable foe with strategic battlefield control.
goals: To weaken and dominate its foes through manipulation of light and spirits.
relations: Often associated with other undead or creatures of darkness.
environment: Can be found in haunted locations or places with significant death.
strengths: High Dexterity allows for agile combat, and it possesses multiple layers of strategic abilities.
weaknesses: While it has immunities to several damage types, it can still be destroyed if its lantern is closed or harmed.
attacks: The Spirit Lamp delivers necrotic damage with its Spirit Claw while also dealing fire damage with its Lantern Beam.
most_powerful_ability: Its Lantern Spirits ability allows it to slow and damage creatures within its illuminated area, creating a field of danger.
senses: It has a keen passive perception of 15, enhancing its awareness of its surroundings.
skills: Proficient in Perception, catching details in its environment.
additional_information: Immunity to necrotic, poison, and psychic damage.
Can’t be surprised due to its Jumpy ability.
The lantern can trap spirits of creatures that die within its light.
Cursed creatures can become new Spirit Lamps if not freed after 30 days.
Resistant to nonmagical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.
test_queries: undead that manipulates light and spirits
menacing creature with a powerful lantern
monster that traps spirits in its light
